subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Joe Girardi said he made the decision to start Joba Chamerlain against the Blue Jays after weighing “a ton of factors,” among them keeping Andy Pettitte on normal rest.
snippet: Joe Girardi said he made the decision to start Joba Chamerlain against the Blue Jays after weighing “a ton of factors,” among them keeping Andy Pettitte on normal rest.
